channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: The Fifth Estate
channel.desc: The top-notch team of hosts Bob McKeown, Gillian Findlay, Mark Kelley and Habiba Nosheen provides unique and engaging documentaries from Canada and beyond. "The Fifth Estate" is a reference to the term Fourth Estate, and was chosen to highlight the program's determination to go beyond everyday news into original journalism. The series has won numerous awards for its reporting, including Gemini Awards, International Emmys, the Michener Award, and even an Academy Award for a 1981 episode that was released in theaters the following year. Since September 1975, Canadians have tuned in to experience interesting stories that are always well-crafted and thought-provoking.

channel.title: About That
channel.desc: Andrew Chang expands the understanding of the stories everybody's talking about.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: The Case Against Cosby
channel.desc: Of the more than 60 women who accused Bill Cosby of sexual assault, only one was able to gain a conviction; this is her story.

channel.title: Falls Around Her
channel.desc: A world-famous Anishinaabe musician returns to the reserve to rest and refresh herself but finds that her fame and the outside world intrude.

channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Sonali Shah marvels at the majesty of Perth and Kinross.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Denise Nurse helps a couple with a budget of ?450,000 find their dream country home.

channel.desc: What's going on in Canada and the world; a ten-minute dose of big news stories.

channel.desc: A fresh take on starting the day and living life.

channel.title: Mini-Jon and Mini-Maple

channel.title: Super Agent Jon Le Bon!
channel.desc: The End of the World Barometer has moved up, and Martha is about to ruin everything.

channel.title: Kingdom Force

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Super Why's Comic Book Adventures
channel.desc: Power Paige and Wonder Red are about to play baseball when The Eraser takes their hats and bat; they need to get their equipment back by spelling words that end in at.

channel.desc: When the Tinhorns trick the Dino Ranchers, Min proves that no matter the circumstances, everyone should always do the right thing and help.

channel.desc: Ryder's super-talented pups help Mayor Goodway during the Adventure Bay talent show day.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!

channel.title: Jeremy and Jazzy
channel.desc: Count down from 5 with the help of Jeremy, Jazzy, and alligators.

channel.title: Big Blue
channel.desc: Glacial city residents are being terrorized by a giant sea spider and Phil must face his deepest fears to save the Calypso Crew.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Rusty Rivets
channel.desc: Rusty and Ruby must save a baby whale that has been beached during a storm and reunite it with her family.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Super Agent Jon Le Bon!
channel.desc: Hostilia sends an army of Jon's clones to take over the Agency.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Mini-Jon and Mini-Maple
channel.desc: The mini-clones got a toy stuck in the tree and are ready to do anything to get it back.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Let's Go, Bananas!

channel.title: Dylan's Playtime Adventures
channel.desc: Dylan imagines he's a sculptor.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Hop
channel.desc: Benny and Hoot turn 2Much and Delisha's simple argument into the trial of the century.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Lu & the Bally Bunch
channel.desc: Gus demands Lu play by the rules.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Go Togo
channel.desc: Stella must recount her riders to make sure everyone has a seat.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Mighty Express
channel.desc: Flicker gets a mega mission delivering a jumbo-sized balloon, but it may be too big for the tiny train.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Mighty Express
channel.desc: Mechanic Milo and Liza must build the new comet exhibit in time for the class field trip to Museum Station.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Playing With Stu
channel.desc: Stu finds the courage to make new friends.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Mittens & Pants
channel.desc: When Pants' friend can't make it for a playdate, Pants' Mom proves she can play kids games just as well as a kid, only different.

channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington nurses an injured bird back to health and discovers a new friend in Pigeonton.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Gary's Magic Fort
channel.desc: Gary and Stuffy want to have a picnic, but Gary refuses to try a snack that is new to him; with help from his friends, Gary resolves to try a taste.

channel.title: Molly of Denali

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA

channel.title: All Creatures Great and Small
channel.desc: James invites Helen to the gala spring dance; Siegfried tries his luck at romance.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Call the Midwife
channel.desc: Lucille helps elderly hoarder Clarice Millgrove who is struggling to keep her independence; Sister Hilda and the team work hard to help a Ghanaian family with an undiagnosed illness; Violet puts herself forward in the upcoming elections.

channel.title: Junior Baking Show
